name: XTREME SNUSBANDRY GAME OF THE YEAR 2013 EDITION
name_original: XTREME SNUSBANDRY GAME OF THE YEAR 2013 EDITION
description:
thats rite, XTREME SNUSBANDRY is here! its my first twine so its a lil ruff around the edges but hopefully an enjoyable, immersive journey into your deepest, worst, bad-husband fantasies. peruse a selection of only the grodiest monster hunks on the market, as your guy looks to purchase a tailor-made hamsome man customized to their exact tastes. but there is an accident at the factory, and you are left with a defective husband - a SNUSBAND. looks like your dreamboat has set sail, and we only have nightmareboats left! collect Divorces to unlock a Secret Husband! XTREME SNUSBANDRY 2013 GAME OF THE YEAR EDITION is fairly short and xtremely free, so give it a play and discover the fatal flaws of these fake fellas….If U Dare………

originally released in 2016
